body_html:
I was having an issue with clang 8.3.3 on OS X High Sierra with CUDA 9.0, and getting the same error:

CMake Error at CMakeLists.txt:35 (MESSAGE): thread_local not supported. THD requires a compiler that supports thread_local. Please upgrade your compiler. If you are on OSX, upgrade to XCode 8 or newer.

I was able to fix this by setting CMAKE_CXX_FLAGS -stdlib=libc++

export CMAKE_CXX_FLAGS=-stdlib=libc++

body:
I was having an issue with clang 8.3.3 on OS X High Sierra with CUDA 9.0, and getting the same error:

`CMake Error at CMakeLists.txt:35 (MESSAGE):
  thread_local not supported.  THD requires a compiler that supports
  thread_local.  Please upgrade your compiler.  If you are on OSX, upgrade to
  XCode 8 or newer.`


I was able to fix this by setting CMAKE_CXX_FLAGS -stdlib=libc++

`export CMAKE_CXX_FLAGS=-stdlib=libc++`
